scripts.dtif:diff: dtifx diff compare ops/artifacts/diff/baseline.dtif.json tokens/catalog.json --format json --output ops/artifacts/diff/report.json && dtifx diff compare ops/artifacts/diff/baseline.dtif.json tokens/catalog.json --format markdown --output ops/artifacts/diff/report.md
scripts.dtif:audit: dtifx audit run --config audit/dtif-audit.config.mjs --reporter json --reporter markdown --out-dir ops/artifacts/audit
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run design-lint
